long_description: Perfect for the beach, campground, sporting events and outdoor concerts, the TravelChair Original Mesh travel chair is totally portable so you can have a comfortable, sturdy seat anywhere you go. Patented push-button snaps lock the frame into place, so assembly takes just seconds. Disassembles easily and stores in its own storage bag with drawstring closure and grab handle; folds down to 23 x 8 x 3 in. for easy storage. Powder-coated steel frame resists rust; ballistic nylon mesh fabric withstands regular use and looks great. TravelChair Original Mesh travel chair has a maximum capacity of 300 lbs.
short_description: Perfect for the beach, campground, sporting events and outdoor concerts, the TravelChair Original Mesh travel chair is totally portable so you can have a comfortable, sturdy seat anywhere you go.
